Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Okhukhung’asibwa khwabandu khuli ahambi nabo bali mukhung’ang’ala nibalechele
Ne shikabetselanga amachelo amacheni okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu halali bakawulilanga nibakakholela omubayo
Emioyo chiabu chakosania, mana bamonyananga balia abamabii mbu: “uno niwina halali ni Omundusa shinga enywe, koo mwitsanga khubolosi nanyu nimulola?”
Yaboola mbu: “Nyasaye wanje yamanya akaboolungwa mwikhulu nende khushialo naye ni omuwulili umumanyi muno.”
Halali (abakhayi) baboola mbu: “ (aka aboolanga ako) ni amalooro katsokaana, halali akakasinjia omwene, ye ni omwimbi, kho akhurererekhwo eshimanyisio shingala Abarumwa aba ambeli.’’
Ne abalaasubila abali imbeli wabu okhurula buli mulukongo khwabasishia. Koo kho bano balasuubila
Ne shikhwaruma imbeli wuwo halali abasatsa bakhwafimbulilanga, kho rebee Abandu betsulilanga nikali mbu shimumanyile tawe
Ne shikhwabakholela (Abarumwa abo) emibili chilalia ebilibwa tawe ne shibali nibamenya tsinyanga tsiosi tawe
Mana nikhubakholela toto indache yabu, mananikhubahabinanendeabakhwachama, ne nikhusishia ababura eshichelo
Toto khwabeshilia eshitabu eshilimwo ametsulisio kenyu. Koo shimuparangakhwo tawe
Ne ni tsingongo tsinga etsiakhwanyasia etsiali nitsikholanga amabii, mana nikhuloonga inyuma wabu Abandu bandi
Ne olwa balola eshinyasio shiefu, mana hawo nibachaka okhwilukha
Mulelukha tawe, kalukhe khubwokholo bwenyu, nende mubimenyo bienyu khomunyoole okhureebwa
Baboola mbu: “abaane toto efwe khwali abamabii.”
Ne nibatsililila okhulila khwabu okho okhula shingala khwabakhola shinga babererwe basimile (bafwile)
Ne nishikhwalonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio khumubayo tawe
Nekhwenyanga	okhukhola omubayo, khwakhekholele efwe abeene, (sikhwakhabarere hakari tawe) toto khubetsanga abakholanga omubayo
Halali khusukunanga abwatoto khububeyi mana nibufunaka (obubeyi obo) niburulaho, ne toto muli nende eshinyasio eshilulu shibalindanga khukamuboolanga kano
Ne ni ebibie bioosi bili mwikulu nende khushialo, ne abali ewuwe shibafuranga okhumulaama nohomba shibachonyanga tawe
Bamwitsominjia eshilo neshitere ne shibachonyanga tawe
Nohomba banyoola Abanyasaye khushialo abalamusinjia

Abanyasaye bandi babetsangamwo (mwikulu nende khushilalo) abalali Nyasaye tawe toto hawo (likulu nende eshialo) biakhabiyile. Ne oluyali lwoosi ni lwa Nyasaye, Omwami we shisaala (Arsh) ali ehale nende akabamuboolangakhwo ako
Shareebungwa akakholanga tawe nabo balirebwa

Nohomba bekholela Abanyasaye bandi abalali Nyasaye tawe? Boola mbu; “Rere ebifune bienyu, kano ni ametsulisio ka bano abali halala ninasi, nende ametsulisio khu balia abali inyuma wanje” Halali abaanji mubo shibamanyile obwatieli tawe, kho mana shibakabukulilangamwo oluchendo tawe
Ne shikwarumakhwo Omurumwa yesiyesi imbeli wuwo halali khwamufimbulila mbu: “ abulaho ulaamwa halali esie, kho munaame”
Ne (abakhayi) baboola mbu: “Nyasaye omunji wetsimbabaasi ali nende Omwana” obutwenufu nobubwe, halali ni Abasumba aboluyali
Shibamuranjililangakhwo khulikhuwa tawe, nabo bakholanga amalomesio keke
Amanyile akali imbeli wabu nende inyuma wabu, neshibasabilanga halali ulia wa Nyasaye achamile, nabo behotselesinjia khulwa okhumuria
